name: Rocket Repair (TheConBot)
description:
Rocket Repair is a small, cute game about a Rocket that was stranded on a deserted asteroid during an exploration away from it's Mothership. Your goal is to repair your Rocket by collecting stars in order to get back to the Mothership :)

Made in a week for the GamesMadeQuick Game Jam!

Credits to Écrivain, n4, Alucard, and rezoner for various assets!
